item.description:
The Cheesecake Factory has a large menu, so there's something for everyone! They do not take reservations, so we may have to hang out at the bar for a bit and order a mimosa while we wait for an available table.

This Cheesecake Factory is located at the Pru. They will validate parking for a discounted rate, but you can also take the Green Line.

Please be 99.9% sure you can make it if you reply yes. I will give out my cell phone # to the people who reply yes.



For more information, see http://www.cheesecake...

group.name: Breakfast, Brunch, Lunch, & Dinner Meetup Group

item.name: Cheesecake Factory Brunch
